00012 void SmartDashboardPacketFactory::Announce(SmartDashboard::Buffer& buf, char id,
00013         SmartDashboard::FIELD_TYPE type, const char* name) {
00014     buf.WriteByte(ANNOUNCE_FRAME);
00015     buf.WriteByte(id);
00016     buf.WriteByte(type);
00017     buf.WriteUTF(name);
00018 }
00019 
00021 int SmartDashboardPacketFactory::GetAnnounceLength(const char* name) {
00022     return 5 + SmartDashboard::Buffer::Utf8Length(name);
00023 }
00024 
00026 void SmartDashboardPacketFactory::UpdatePrefix(SmartDashboard::Buffer& buf,
00027         char id, int dataLength) {
00028     buf.WriteByte(UPDATE_FRAME);
00029     buf.WriteByte(id);
00030     buf.WriteByte(dataLength);
00031 }
00032 
00034 int SmartDashboardPacketFactory::GetUpdateLength(int dataLength) {
00035     return 3 + dataLength;
00036 }
